content.detailedDescription: I was standing behind my mini-van in my driveway preparing to load it with lawn cutting equipment.It was a beautiful moring after a strong cold front moverd through the region and the sky was eccepitonaly clear and blue.And i couldn't help notice how well i could see a jet aircraft flying out of detroit airport and it had not met its cruising altitude yet and just thought to myself that the atmosphere was so clear.Then i noticed just above the jet was a object stationary just like the planet venus or jupiter but there was no way it could have been a star or planet at that time in the morning.It was just so out place. it was not moving twoard me or away from me it did not move left or right. it was not a seagull or flock of them. at that time i wanted to get my binoculars then i had hoped that my video tape recorder was charged and it wasnt so i tried to plug it in and take it out and it was gone after about a quick two minutes. i scanned the sky with my eyes and nothing.
content.summary: Watching passenger jet flying out of detroit over toledo looking into western sky clear blue morning i noticed above the aircraft was a object stationary above and west of jet
Driving 405n fiming the sky for ufo's and this guy dropped in.

content.detailedDescription: There were four of us sitting on the deck of my brother pats house looking to the west when a star suddenly dropped down about 6 inches in the sky then at a 90 degrees angle it went south at a high rate of speed out of sight. we all looked at each other and made sure that each of us had seen the same thing it was that strange that it had caught each of our eye.
content.summary: It was a star like light

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking at spproximatelt 10:10 pm on sunday evening and stood still for a moment just outside my house tracking an object flying silently directly overhead in a westerly direction with two blinking red lights when suddenly there was a flash (similar to a huge camera flash or a stroboscopic flash) in the western sky at about 70 degrees up in the sky in my right field of vision. immediately thereafter i observed a "swarm" - and i say "swarm" because that is the closest thing that what i saw resembled - of tiny lights moving very rapidly from the north (near where the flash in the sky had occurred) in a southerly direction. there were many tiny lights - perhaps as many as fifty or more, though i cannot say for certain how many, there were as many as the idea of a "swarm" came to my mind to describe what i saw. the lights moved in an atypical manner as compared to common aircraft in that the individual trajectories of the lights criss-crossed one another in a manner similar to living things - a moving swarm of insects, a flock of birds, or a school of fish. though moving very rapidly, they did not appear to collide or combine with one another. the lights seemed to have volition, that is - they seemed conscious of their movement and direction. the lights were very tiny pinpricks of white light, and appeared, based on the plane that i had been observing flying overhead just prior to seeing them, to be flying at a very very high altitude. i observed them for perhaps 10 seconds as they flew in a southerly direction in general towards the bright star or planet that presently dominates the southern sky in the evening hours until they disappeared from sight - not behind an obstruction in my field of vision, but when they got too far away for me to see them any more. the line of trajectory within which i observed this swarm of lights flying was not more than one foot in the sky from the time of the flash until they disappeared from sight. there were no sounds, and to be honest, i was so shocked at what i saw, that i totally forgot the aircraft i had been observing, or what happened to that. i am sure that the pilots on that aircraft must have observed what i saw. this event occurred directly over the monterey bay. the weather conditions were the sky was clear and very dark with a few wisps of fog or clouds at a low level. it was cool and silent and visibility was excellent. this is what i saw in its entirety. i did not get any bad feelings from what i saw. at first when i saw the flash, i was confused, thinking perhaps a camera flash had gone off, but in a moment i realized that was not what had occurred, and that i had seen a flash in the sky. when i looked back towards where the flash had occurred, that was when i observed the swarm of lights. i never have seen anything like this before, and do not know what it was. there is plenty of military in this area and there is a nasa installation south of here near big sur. i would be very curious to know (probably we will never know) whether these objects or lights were observed by nasa or the military, or if anyone else in this area observed what i saw last night.
content.summary: Observed a swarm of objects flying from north in a southerly direction in the western sky

content.detailedDescription:
While browsing http://hazecam.Net i cam across an interesting picture. at first i thought they were helicopters but after compairing them to helicopter photos i realized they weren't helicoptors. the one thing that comes close i found at http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=xq9t6rp2als

the object in the video resembles the objects i captured on 5-22-07 in boston mass.

johnny wheeler
content.summary: Screen capture from http://hazecam.Net

content.detailedDescription: my friend and i where playing at my house and then we went outside and started playing on my trampoline then we lied down and looked at the clouds we saw some strange clouds such as a cone headed man with pointed eye brows and strange facial hair, and other strange clouds. then i saw it, a circular  disk shaped object it was kind of shiny and was traveling approximately three times the speed of an airplane that later flew by, it was going west to east. though i tried to point it out to my friend, he didn't see it. at first i thought it was a spot in my vision from the light but i then looked some where else and i didn't see it so i thought it must be a ufo. i didn't think much of it at the time. i lost sight of it after it disappeared into a cloud i then went inside with my friend to tell my dad and he told me to file this report so i did.
content.summary: My friend and i where looking at the couds and i saw a circular disc object fly across the the sky and dissapear in the couds.

content.detailedDescription:
Each has smaller round reddish/orange around them. so far a large plane has flown near the 2nd object, the 1st craft has had several planes go by it. i noticed the first round object almost an hour ago. it's still here, it's moved and it's lights have dimmed. 2nd object had the same light pattern as larger object.

both have smaller different colored objects floating. the smaller ones i can't see a design, but they are different colors.

very odd.

my friend noticed seond craft.
content.summary: There are now 2 bigger objects,1 in western sky over arvada and another closer to denver

content.detailedDescription:
We are sitting on the patio looking at the western sky and it's still there.

1st noticed because it's burning bright! too bright for a star.
sever planes have flown by this as well.

i will post more
content.summary: Round discus,white lights on main ship. 2 smallers orbs floating around main craft.

content.detailedDescription:
Last friday night june 8th around 10 to 10:30pm my family and i were having a bonfire on the beach in avon, nc on hatteras island. we had been star gazing for about 10 minutes or so and i spotted what looked like 1 moving star. i pointed it out to my wife and my mom and they started watching it too. the moving light looked just like a star but i thought it may have been an airplane. the thing about it was that it did not have any blinking lights it was a solid light that looked like a star.

the light was moving from the north to the south in the night sky. the light had been moving for about 30 seconds to a minute when it passed by another star that was stationary and kept going. the star or light that was stationary started following the 1st light. when the second star or light started following the first light the first light changed direction from south to north to a east direction which made it look like it was loosing altitude. the 1st star or light stayed on this course for maybe a minute and then started moving north across the sky again. as the first light switched direction from east to north the second light turned south follwoing the path of the first light. the first light continued north and disappeared and the second light disappeared around the same area that the 1st light turned north.

i only saw the one light following or chasing the other but my wife was telling me that she saw a third star or light follwing the second and she said as the second light disappeared the third light became stationary and looked like a dim star.

about 30 minutes later as we were getting ready to walk back to the house we were still looking at the sky to see if we could find any more moving lights. i noticed another star and it was probably the 3rd brightest star in the sky. it was directly east of us over the horizion of the ocean and was stationary. this star or light did not have any blinking lights as well and we only looked at it because it was so bright. we watched it for a few minutes and this star or light got dim and started moving south across the sky. i was thinking that maybe just maybe this was a plane that had changed direction but there were not blinking lights on this object either. as this object started moving south it just disappeared. 

right now i don't know what we watched. i don't believe that the first siting with the stars following the stars were planes. however i kind of lean toward the fact that the second siting may have been a plane that changed direction. i don't know though because it did not have any blinking lights. if someone could pull any kind of radar logs or something i think they could either prove or rule out airplanes.
content.summary: Stars chasing a star? moving stars?

content.detailedDescription: I work outside at night for a major transportation company.  at around 2145 i noticed a bright white light in the sky at about the 40 degree position in the sky.  since i work only about 10 miles from metro airport, i thought it was the landing lights at first of a airliner, but dismissed that thought as it was at a higher altitude for a normal approach to the airport.  then i thought maybe it was the space station or something like that?  it was a lot larger than a normal star, so i thought maybe it was some planet passing close to earth.  i then went about doing my work, and kind of forgot about it.  my location at the time of the sighting was on the west side of our building.  i was driving a fork lift while preparing the trailers for the next loads.  at about 2330 i was waiting for a tractor to come for fuel on the north side of the building when i noticed the orb again.  it was now about at the 20 degree point in the sky, having now almost traversed half the sky.  i seen another employee come by a overhead door to have a smoke.  he started telling me he was a tomato grower, and was worried about the weather lately.  so i said " have you ever seen this star when you have been outside"?  an took him out a few  steps so he could see it.  he said no. then said he would look tomorrow with his brothers telescope on saturday night for it.  another tractor came at the fuel island about 15 minutes later, and i asked the driver if he had ever seen this bright star before. as i pointed at where it was last time i seen it, it was gone.  later when he came back to the yard, i was driving a tractor out of the wash tunnel when he flashed his lights to tell me that it was " all over the radio about something in the sky".  i told him what i saw was not a shooting star or a comet, but a large star like object.  the same white as a star. i don't know what it was.  it moved from south to north from about the 40 to last i seen the 20 degree mark in the western sky. what i heard on the radio after work did not describe what i saw.
content.summary: White light orb, star color, size in sky slightly smaller than a street lamp

content.detailedDescription:
This is no joke. let me begin to tell you the story.
 
on saturday, june 9th, between 5:30pm and 6:00pm, i was shooting omar on top of the hill at centenial park (dollard des ormeaux, quebec: suburb of montreal).
 
when i got home i began to process my raw pictures and noticed that something was weird between pictures number nor_5676 to nor_5682. at first i thought that it was dust but when i looked closer, it was very clearly a ufo (unidentified flying object).
 
now, i have all the pictures in raw format, so they cannot be touched as so. i also have kept the disk on which i was shooting. these pictures were taken at 1/1000th of a second and as you can see omar in his movement that this object was flying really fast. the whole sequence of shots is no longer than one second.
 
i shot with a nikon d200.
 
you can view the pictures here: www.Normedwards.Com/3/ufo/page_01.Htm
content.summary: Round with a white cloudy halo

content.detailedDescription: Picture of shuttle launch was taken from the pineda causeway at patrick air force base, fl.
content.summary: Ufo in picture of shuttle launch sts-117 on 6/8/07

content.detailedDescription:
I work in boca raton on the weekends. twice before i have reported seeing an object(s) (4-29-07 and 5-27-07) and photos were posted (5-27-07).

this time i think i hit the jackpot!!!

while looking out over the atlantic ocean, off the coast of boca raton, not only did i see a similar object (just like i reported before) but, numerous objects!!! some white, some red and some dark!

the time i saw these objects was between 3p.M. and 4:30p.M. and not just localized in one area but, a wide area over the atlantic!

using my kodak z740 digital camera, i took numerous photos and will post the pictures soon.

something is going on out there and it's kinda thrilling!!!

this is blowing my mind!

while some of the objects were stationary, some were also moving near each other!!!
content.summary: Somethings going on over the atlantic ocean!!!

content.detailedDescription:
The sightings happened twice in the same month of november '85, both cases on a thursday night (i was returning from university classes). the first sighting was on i-95, i believe it was just before the yonkers toll gates as i was heading north.

it was a dark cloudy night which is why i couldn't determine the size. it was coming south at a 30��� angle from my right to the left. it was some 500 ft above the ground, going very slowly, about 20-30 mph, and without sound. i called the ardsley police upon arrival at a friend's house. i asked them if anyone had called saying they'd seen a ufo. the person on the other side said that many had.

i intuitively sensed it was a ufo and wasn't scared, but i was excited. i stayed in the car, and didn't open the window.

the second sighting was in tarrytown, some 10-15 miles nw of my first sighting, two weeks later. (i can't remember if they were the first and third or fourth and second, but alternating weeks.) as i was headed north on broadway at the center of town, a similar sighting occurred. it was clear enough that a guy in a car in front got out of his car and just screamed out 'i believe'. this ufo might have been flying a little lower than the first one. there were similar v-shaped lights, but i don't remember how many there were. traffic was moving so i had to continue driving, losing sight of the object.

this time i got out of the car. i again heard no noise. it was moving in a similar 30��� angle from my front right to my left rear. i couldn't make out its shaped, but the lights were sufficiently separated at the distance to suppose it was 'large'.

there may have been a third sighting, but i have little recollection of the details. it was coming from nj to ny over the george washington bridge. traffic was a little heavy so cars were just sitting, advancing slowly. as i looked forward, towards the bridge, i saw an object fly low. it wasn't a plane, but i wasn't impressed by it. it could've been a ufo, but i didn't react as i did with the other two.
content.summary: Cloudy night, v-shaped set of 5 lights - 2 on one side, 3 the another

content.detailedDescription: It was a clear day and i was getting off the expressway (i-71 northbound)as i got to the end of the exit ramp i saw a craft in the sky it was to the right of the expressway i was shocked at what i saw i new what it was as soon as i saw it i'm pretty good at identifying aircraft as i'm a private pilot the craft was at a altitude of around 800 feet above ground level it was not moving at all the craft was all silver like shinny metal it was around 70 feet wide it was kind of disk shaped it was straight across at top and sloped down at like a 45 degrees on both sides then straight down then back in at a 45 degree i was so shocked i couldn't even speak i remember i looked at it for around 30 seconds and i looked away and i thought to myself there is no way i just saw that the craft was around a mile away but i got a good look at it and i looked back and it was still there i looked at it for around 20 seconds more and then it flew off at a amazing speed in the blink of your eye it was gone i could barely tell what direction it went it it looked like it went southwest i did not here any sound from it i would say before i saw this i thought aliens might be real with so many stories out there but i would say i found it hard to believe i guess its just something you have got to see with your own eyes to believe but as soon as i saw that craft i new we are not alone and there are things we know nothing about i will never forget it and i hope i see something like it again
content.summary: I saw a exterrestrial craft

content.detailedDescription:
Date & time: 
friday, june 8, 2007; 9:00 p.M.--ish

place of encounter:
i was in my backyard.  i was out to run my little dog with the light pen and to do some sky-watching--not really thinking to see much over the suburbs of sacramento...When i looked over my rooftop to the eastern sky and this "thing" which was flying low at a moderate rate of speed come across the sky.  when i say "low" i mean it was flying at about the height of local helicopters when they buzz over your house and it was fairly large, so that's how close it was.

duration of encounter:
i counted the seconds (7) from the moment i saw it and followed it through my backyard as it passed across the skyline out of my range of vision as i have large trees in my backyard.  my backyard length is about 110 feet, so do the math.

color and shape:
it was light grey, oval-shaped, but not defined--as if you took a picture of a cloud, imported it into photoshop or other photo program then cropped out an oval shape and filtered a gradient from the center to the edge, giving it a three-dimensional hazy appearance.  it had no visible lights.

ground lighting:
the sky was almost completely dark.  there was ambient light from local businesses, but we have a tall fence, so most all of the light is filtered softly through the trees or appearing just over the cusp of the fence-line to the west of my house.  the encounter was to the east.

flight pattern:
it flew in a straight line from a south-eastern heading to a north direction: from my home it would be from orangevale/fair oaks, over citrus heights (where i live), heading towards roseville, ca.

sound:
it made no sound.

my reaction was one of disgust in myself because i had my video camera, set on night vision, but my dog was bugging on me to play with the light pen so i sat the camera down.  that is when this "thing" appeared.  my feelings about it were elation; my rational mind said that it was quite unusual.
content.summary: Oval-shaped object flying south to north over eastern skyline

content.detailedDescription: At appx 9:03 pm on wednesday, june 6, 2007, i went out to put my car windows up and a bright light in the southern sky caught my eye.  i looked up and saw a round, very, very bright light moving in a northeasterly direction.  i watched for a few seconds observing the object.  there were no flashing lights, no strobing lights, no identifying lights as seen on the many planes that fly in our skies (day and night)from our local county airport.  there was no trail of any kind either.  it appeared to be a circular glowing bright light - not something on fire or burning.  i quickly went to the porch, opened the door and called to my 14 yr old grandson to come look.  he came out and observed the object as well.  he said, "gram, get your camera!"  i said, "what is that?  it is so bright and moving so fast."  the light never changed in brightness or appearance as it approached me, passed over us, or moved away from us (the object was entirely enveloped in bright white light - i noticed that there were light rays eminating from it as though the light source was internal).  it appeared to be traveling at a low altitude and at a very high speed.  there was no sound to be heard as this object approached, flew over us and flew away from us.  before we lost sight of it beyond the trees, my grandson was observing it with the binoculars:  i said, "look there is a plane headed in its direction (the plane was heading north and was in the eastern sky).  the plane must have been at a much higher altitude and further away from us as it appeared as a pin dot, but you could clearly make out the flashing red and white lights.  the unknown object was very large in size in comparison to the plane and to the stars that were out at the time.  i have never seen anything like this before in my entire life.  one other note:  the object seemed to zig-zag a few times as it was moving away from us.  my grandson and i both noticed this.  the object did not appear to be falling at any time during my observation, but navigating. this was a very odd experience!
content.summary: Large, silent, fast-moving and very bright white circular light was seen in the night sky over upstate ny on 6-6-07

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling north on the fairfax co. parkway between herndon and sterling  
around 8:00pm on march 4th when a large glowing object caught my eye. it was much larger than the largest star and was not as bright as a street light, hence why i described it as glowing. by the time my eyes were able to focus   
on the glowing circular object it started picking up speed. it moved northward horizontally in a strait line at amazing speed until it vanished.
it made fighter jets look slow. too bad i could not tell the size or altitude. i felt very excited and knew this was no normal craft. i'm sure some other people had to have seen this and i should have reported it sooner.
content.summary: Circle glowing much larger that the largest star accelerated across the sky to amazing speed then vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
On the day of the sighting, mr. fox (pseudonym) had the day off from work, taking some compensation time off from his job on march 29, 2007.  he slept in that morning and moved through the remainder of the day in a casual manner.  in the afternoon, he stepped outside for a cigarette.  the sky was fairly clear, just a light haze, accented by isolated high altitude clouds.

looking up at the sky toward the south from the back porch of his apartment, he noticed an object moving through the sky.  he stated that he often looks toward the sky whenever he gets a chance in order to iden-tify objects such as airplanes, helicopters, etc.  this particular object caught his attention because of its unusual shape and movement.  as he focused on the object, it changed shape, sometimes appearing as a ball shape, sometimes as a little more elongated, perhaps an arc, then back to a ball with a dot circling around the larger object.  he didn���t recall seeing more than two dots or balls at any one time; it was either a big ���blob��� or separated into two objects hovering around each other.  he also stated that there was no sound associated with the passing of the object.

at this point, he had been watching it for about 90 seconds and the object had moved from east to west.  when it started to disappear over the neighbor���s house, he  ran up stairs to retrieve a pair of small binocu-lars, a nikon travelite iii, 7x20.  his significant other asked, ���where���s the fire?  what���s the deal?��� 

mr. fox replied, ���i think i���m seeing a ufo.���  he ran back down the stairs, out the back door, and down to the street corner where he could continue viewing the object.  he stated that the object, through the bin-oculars, looked like six or seven little objects ���flocking��� together in the same direction, but very close to-gether.  he estimated the altitude to be at about 10,000 to 15,000 feet and appeared at about a 45 degree angle.  he watched the object until it was just a ���pinprick��� and disappeared off to the west.
content.summary: Cluster of black globular objects changing position to create various formations as it traversed the sky in a west-southwesterly direction

content.detailedDescription: I was at work when i got a call from my brother telling me to look at the sky. he lives close by my job.  i looked up and saw an object moving back and forth, up and down while changing colors rapidly.  it also shone a beam of red light which it appeared to be flashing to the ground. this lasted for almost two hours. i was able to take video with my cell phone video camera, i have an older model phone which cannot send video's out to e-mail but i have it saved in my phone if there is interest in viewing or any possibility of transferring the info to anyone.  it was also viewed and photoed by my brother. i am including a picture but i reinterate that i do have video of it moving and changing color.  it was still there when i went to bed so i have no idea how long it actually stayed there.
content.summary: Bright light, bouncing in the air, and changing colors from white to blue and back to white again, red beam sent down to the ground

content.detailedDescription: Hoy dia 7 de junio del 2007 tuve 3 avistamientos de los cuales fueron tomados con mi camara sony. el primero es un avion un poco raro parece un gran pez con la cola hacia arriba, el segundo es una esfera entre cafe y un color obscuro. el tercero es una nave la cual tambien le tome video en el mes marzo. al principio pense que era un avion pero cuando vi con los binoculares, no era un avion.  nl
content.summary: Resumen del mes de junio

content.detailedDescription: Wiggers are serious threat to this country. they are the real aliens. i say that we should get a mob to together and purify the cities of all the wiggers. meet behind the bridge at 11:00 tonight if you agree. purifacation must be completed!!! if you are a wigger and you're reading this, be afraid, very afraid.
content.summary: You should know about wiggers.

content.detailedDescription:
i get up every morning around 6 am, go to my kitchen turn the hot water on for my coffee. when i have my toast and coffee ready i sit down at my table 
which is facing west, and have my breakfast, turn the tv on and watch cnn news. 
 at around 6:30 to 6:45 i just happened to look outside, ( there was a few clouds around and the sun was coming up and it was very bright outside) i noticed a couple of silver ball type objects heading north,there was a few trees in font of the objects, and then an open patch, and then the roof of the house next door.  i could not believe what i was seeing, i ran to the window ( which was closed ) and tried to see what they were, it was not a plane ( no tail ), it was not a helicopter, it was just plain silver balls. 
           
 when they disappeared behind the house i then ran to my front window to see if i could see them again, but the street is lined with trees which blocked my vision. my heart was really pumping, i just could not believe what i just saw. as they were going behind the roof of the house next door, they seemed to be gaining speed, but i don't know for sure.

 i then sat down to finish my breakfast, my head going a million miles an hour and then i saw another one, silver ball, by the time i got to the window again it was gone.

 i must not be the only one who saw it, as at that time of the morning there are a lot of people heading down town to work.

they were probably 5 to 7 city blocks away. just guessing of the altitude of about 500 feet of the ground.

now when i have my breakfast, or go anywhere i always have a digital camera with me.
content.summary: Silver balls, coming from the south going north, 2 and then 1 about 1 to 2 min later
Orange ball touches window

content.detailedDescription: Walking to work one day, late afternoon (approximately 4 pm) on a sunny summer day with very few clouds in the sky, i noticed a stationary object in the sky, very small and distant. it was shiny and metallic, appeared to be round but it was hard to tell because it was so far away and high up in the sky. it sat completely stationary and motionless for several minutes. suddenly, it began moving very smoothly and rapidly in, i believe, a southern direction. it appeared to be moving as quickly as a jet would, but left no jet stream. it flew in a perfectly straight line. it disappeared rapidly into the distance. i was baffled by what this object could have possibly been.
content.summary: Bizarre, distant object, did not behave like any known plane or aircraft

content.detailedDescription: I belive it was in the spring. i was walking home from town,chambersburg. it was about 3:00 in the morning. something made me look up. there in front of me was two rectangular shapes, like sitting on top of each other, it was like two solid green lights. i stoped and stared at it in amazement. then after a few seconds it took-off to the left and dissapered. then a few seconds later i saw a green light way off in the distance,by the mountian range. it moved real fast to another spot, then it came back to where i was. i was frozen with fear wathching this. another couple of seconds later, which felt like minuets, it started to fly away .It just got smaller and smaller until it was gone. i was only about 17 when this happened and didn't tell anyone cause i was afraid they would make fun of me and think i was crazy or making it up. so i never told anyone until just a few years ago. can you help me ? all the ufo pictures i've seen are nothing like this. you can contact me at acjuray@yahoo.Com
content.summary: Two green-glowing rectangular shapes connected in middel horizontally, hovering, then moving

content.detailedDescription:
I view many web cams on the internet and hazecam.Net is one of my favorite sites to view.
 
today while drinking my coffee and browsing the internet i saw something on the newark/new york web cam that i found quite interesting.

it doesn't appear to be a plane that i recognize so i would have to call this one an unknown for lack of a better term.
content.summary: Web cam capture from hazecam.Net 6-7-07 at 9:15 am

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking on a back trail with my dog when six to ten ships fly low overhead. three of them were inverted y from the back and front. thoes ships landed in a clearing while three more flew overhead. the three were black with a blue outline on the hexagon wings. from the front view, they looked like a h with a ball in the center. the ones that landed were white with white blinking lights, such as an aircraft on earth and a contuous blue light on the back. their two wings on the bottom folded up making a w shape as it landed, making a deep moan and a whine as a jet engine. when that happened, 6 ramps, two per ship, opened up. i couldnt believe it. then, several human like creatures came out. they were white with black joint areas. then, one took off his head, but it was a helmet. it was human! he caried what looked like an automatic weapon of some kind. the weapon was black. it looked like an earth weapon. there were dosens of the aliens! some were talking, some were unloading boxes. they spoke english. it seemed like they were military, but not ours. i got a peak in the only window on the ship closest to me. a human wearing a space suit such as our astronauts and a black helmet just like the white guys. so as soon as the ships left and the white guys were gone, i got the hell out of there.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Landing of three ships. total of six ships

content.detailedDescription: First off i have really bad spelling, so just go with it. but heres how it started. i fixing the front end of my car in the garage because i hit a raccoon the other day and i have a big road trip im going on tomorrow. after im done banging the dang thing out i get this urge to go outside and check out the stars, the night was really clear and i just had this weird urge to do just that. normally im pretty scared of the dark outside and rarely go outside after turning the outside lights off. so i go outside and can clearly see venus, very bright lower in the western sky. i also see a low flying plain to the north of me that is very easily noticeable as a plane... red and blue lights with a flash every once in while. so i look back to the western sky and i notice this orange light heading in a north-east direction. i thought it could have been a distant plane or a satellite at first but as it got closer it wasn't flying in an orbital path (it was going straight) and it certainly didn't have a red and blue light with the occasional flash. so this light is getting closer and closer (id say probably about 1,000 to 2,000 feet up, but its hard to say with no reference). so as this thing is approaching i suddenly get this feeling that something is watching me from behind, and right as i turn around (looking south-east) there is a  very bright white (that comparable to venus) light moving south and another less bright white light moving in the same direction (basically follow-the-leader). as soon as i see this light i feel that it knows im there, some sort of deep down feeling that was pretty much indescribable. so the bright light shrinks down to the size of the light infront of it and they continue to move across the sky beyond the tree line at the same speed in the same direction one behind the other. this is when i knew something was weird. so i look back in the direction of the orange light and its just sitting there in the sky. and i all of the sudden get the same odd feeling that it knows im there. and right when i got this feeling the object began to head north east heading towards erie. pretty intense. overwhelming fear at the same time i felt comfort from my deep down need to know that something else is out there. and that it is real. and that its probably watching us.
content.summary: 3 fly objects (one orange two white)

content.detailedDescription:
At my family's farm, 35 minutes north of lindsay, on: 
sitting, relaxing in the farm's yard, i was star-gazing as i do when i get out of the city. the first "light" passed by in the sky about 75 degrees up, at least 60000 ft ++, travelling ne. from what i have deduced, it was travelling at approximately 700 mi/ hour. i simply brushed it off as a satelite. clear sky, no extreme light poluting the sky (save for the very dim hue coming from lindsay). as i sat, i began to see others at varying degrees, between 45 and 75, and travelling at similar speeds and at heights between 60000- 90000 ft. two of them appeared to slow down (close to what appeared to be a stop) only to speed up again to 700- 800 mi/ hr. each different "light event" produced yellow/ orange/ red and blue/ purple. although consciously i continue to shrug this off as a satelite event, something tells me it was not. i have spent many summer nights watching the consistencies of satelite activity. this was not consistent. i would love to know if anyone else witnessed this or if there was an event that you at mufon know about. unfortunately, no camera as i was decidedly roughing it. 
i have also reported this at nuforc.
content.summary: 7 lights travelling ne at 700 mi/hr, 60000-90000 ft.
